title: rip exhaust
body: so what i have noticed is exhaust is mainly used as a defensive option you know reduce 40% of a champion's dmg for a short bit but with the new ie what will we actually use this thing on since 20% of crit dmg is going to be true why should i be taking it against the adc or some assassin building crit for some god knows reason?

replies.body:
Because it will still work on {{champion:63}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:145}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:59}} and most other things that want to show up and ruin your lane, not to mention lategame teamfights, where it is strongest anyway.

Plus 20% of crits is still only about 10% of damage for most ADCs at most points in the game, they still lose most of it.

It also applies a pretty powerful slow.
